orderId.description: Id of the order; Either orderId or clientOrderId is required. If both are passed, orderId will be used.

clientOrderId.description: Client order Id as assigned by the user; Either orderId or clientOrderId is required. If both are passed, orderId will be used.

price.description: Only applicable to LIMIT/IOC/FOK/POST_ONLY orders;  MARKET/ASK/BID orders will ignore this field

quantity.description: Either quantity or amount is required;  If both are passed, the request will be rejected
